articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: More dolls, better living
articles.description: Trump must be the first president in history to say that his policies will deprive American children of toys — but he was ultimately dismissing abundance, one of the marvels of our system.
articles.content:
President Trump downplayed the significance of potentially empty store shelves at his Wednesday Cabinet meeting.
He said of goods from China that might go missing in the trade war, “much of it we don’t need.”
Then, he elaborated the point: “Well, may... [3856 chars]

articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Trump threatens to slap sanctions, cut off business with countries that buy Iranian oil
articles.description: President Trump on Thursday threatened to slap secondary sanctions and cut off business with foreign countries that purchase Iranian oil products, hours after planned nuclear talks with Tehran were postponed.
articles.content:

articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: Inside the secret genius of the Ukraine mineral deal
articles.description: President Trump has just struck one big, beautiful deal with Ukraine — and its impact could reach far beyond rare earth minerals.
articles.content:
President Trump has just struck one big, beautiful deal with Ukraine — and its impact could reach far beyond rare earth minerals.

articles.author: ElliotLakeToday.com
articles.title: Trade war injects note of uncertainty into CN Rail outlook, as profits climb
articles.description: MONTREAL — Canadian National Railway Co. saw a rise in both profits and uncertainty in its latest quarter as the country's biggest railroad operator worked through a trade war set off by U.S. President Donald Trump.
articles.content:
